info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, southern Cleveland, Laurens, southeastern Greenville, Spartanburg, Cherokee, northeastern Abbeville, northwestern Union and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Spartanburg to 9 miles south of Abbeville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Gaffney, Laurens, Clinton, Fountain Inn, Boiling Springs SC, Woodruff, Pacolet, Cowpens and Ware Shoals. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
